name: Dragon OG
description: Dragon OG (or Red Dragon OG) is a sativa-dominant hybrid cross between Red Dragon and OG Kush. Red Dragon adds gentle invigoration to OG Kush’s mid-level sedation and pleasant euphoria. This heady hybrid offers mood-boosting mental stimulation and relaxing body effects that stick to the bones. Enjoy this strain throughout the day to boost creativity and combat moderate pain, but beware: this potent combination can be overstimulating in large doses.
attributes_title: Uplifted, Relaxed, Creative, Energetic, Happy, Pain, Depression, Stress, Spasticity, Dry Mouth, Paranoid
